plugin_info.plugin_description: Export a network saved in Hydra to an Excel book.
plugin_info.plugin_epilog: Written by K Mohamed (khaled.mohamed@manchester.ac.uk) (c) Copyright 2015, The University of Manchester For more information visit Hydra website

arg.name: network
arg.help: The ID of the network to be exported

arg.name: scenario
arg.help: Specify the ID of the scenario to be exported.

arg.name: server_url
arg.help: Specify the URL of the server to which this plug-in connects.

arg.name: session_id
arg.help: Specify the session ID for the connection. If not specified, the plugin will try to connect based on the credentials it finds in config

arg.name: start-date
arg.help: Start date of the time period used for exporting. Must be after 1900-01-01.

arg.name: end-date
arg.help: End date of the time period used for exporting. Must be after 1900-01-01.

arg.name: time-step
arg.help: Time step used for exporting. The time step needs to be specified as a valid time length as supported by Hydra's unit conversion function (e.g. 1 sec, 3 min, 2 hr, 4 day, 1 mon, 1 yr)
